name: report
description: Execute this command to set or query user defined report parameters.

fields.name: event_id
fields.label: event_id
fields.description: The reportâ€™s numeric identifier. This number is defined by Programmer and can be any number from 100 through 109

fields.name: longitude
fields.label: longitude
fields.description: The longitude of center point of defined circle zone.

fields.name: latitude
fields.label: latitude
fields.description: The latitude of center point of defined circle zone.

fields.name: radius
fields.label: Zone Tolerence
fields.description: The radius of the circle zone. The effective range is from 50 to 65535 meters.

fields.name: duration
fields.label: Output Duration
fields.description: Unit of duration is 100 milliseconds. Ex: if want to setup duration for 2 seconds, you have to give a 20 value. (Min. 1=0.1 second; Max. 255 = 25.5 seconds)

fields.name: toggle_times
fields.label: Toggle Times
fields.description: The times from its current state to its alternate state and back again. Min. 1 times; Max. 255 times
